title: Gamification-Based Financial Literacy Improvement Program for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic financial terminology (interest rates, budgets, etc.) and experience with simple financial management
context.additional_context: Customized financial scenarios for working professionals, with digital game-based learning conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can execute budget achievement strategies with over 80% accuracy in payroll management/investment simulation games
Learners can write self-assessment reports reflecting at least three financial decision-making principles during game debriefing sessions
Learners can create personal financial plans and explain risk management strategies through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
